product_name: Overland Equipment Acadia Daypack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Overland Equipment Acadia daypack has the organization and room you need for day-to-day and weekend adventures: 1,031 cu. in. capacity with bottle holder, laptop sleeve and organization pockets. Easy-access laptop sleeve holds up to a 15.4 in. laptop; side pocket holds your water bottle within reach. Comfortable, breathable padded back panel; padded shoulder straps. Includes a fleece-lined cell phone/sunglass pocket. Durable ballistic nylon and ripstop nylon exterior. Closeout.
short_description: The Overland Equipment Acadia daypack has the organization and room you need for day-to-day and weekend adventures: 1,031 cu. in. capacity with bottle holder, laptop sleeve and organization pockets.
